name: Tethered (itch) (T.reese2345, Omniscient Ice, leviathon1618)
description:
Escape Together!

Made for Kiwijam 2022 in 48 hours. Based off the theme: Togetherness

Summary/Plot:

Prisoners Raeve and Eski managed to escape the clutches of the Vagknars, by stealing one of their shuttles. As a result of a hasty escape, they crashed onto a passing asteroid, splitting it apart. 

Team: 
  • Connor Talbot
  • Orion Coupland
  • Levi Delaney
  • Khai Gan
  • Therese Alimario
  • Gemma Hoyle
  • Fiona Lai
  • Tauma Lobacheva
  • Qun Ma
Goal:

Raeve and Eski must work together with the help of a virtual assistant HALO (Human Assistance Lumos Omnidroid) to find the scattered parts of their emergency shuttle and put them back together while being tethered together. 

Controls:

Player 1 uses WASD while player 2 uses arrow keys (↑ ↓ → ←) to move, configured on gloves, one left and one right. Each finger on the glove inputs a direction on either Raeve (right) or Eski (left).
